languages.text: "Раз вы здесь, семьи от вас отказались. Вы все отбросы, достойные только вони нижних палуб!"
"The fact you're here means your families have disowned you. You're all refuse, and the stench of the lower decks is all you deserve!"
languages.original_text: "Раз вы здесь, семьи от вас отказались. Вы все отбросы, достойные только вони нижних палуб!"

traits.locale_text: "Your being here means your families have disowned you. You're all trash and the stench of the lower decks is all you deserve!"
"Your being here means your families have disowned you. You're all trash and the stench of the lower decks is all you deserve!"
"The fact you're here means your families have disowned you. You're all trash, and the stench of the lower decks is all you deserve!"
"The fact you're here means your families have disowned you. You're all trash, and the stench of the lower decks is all you deserve!"
"The fact you're here means your families have disowned you. You're all refuse, and the stench of the lower decks is all you deserve!"
"The fact you're here means your families have disowned you. You're all trash, and the stench of the lower decks is all you deserve!"

languages.text: «Si estáis aquí es porque vuestras familias os han desechado. ¡No sois más que escoria, y la peste de las cubiertas inferiores es lo único que merecéis!».
languages.original_text: "The fact you're here means your families have disowned you. You're all refuse, and the stench of the lower decks is all you deserve!"

traits.locale_text: «Si estáis aquí es porque vuestras familias os han desechado. ¡No sois más que escoria, y la peste de las cubiertas inferiores es lo único que merecéis!».

languages.text: 「お前たちがここにいるということは、家族から見放されたということだ。お前たちはゴミだ。下層デッキの悪臭がお似合いな存在だ！」
languages.original_text: "The fact you're here means your families have disowned you. You're all refuse, and the stench of the lower decks is all you deserve!"

traits.locale_text: 「お前たちがここにいるということは、家族から見放されたということだ。お前たちはゴミだ。下層デッキの悪臭がお似合いな存在だ！」

languages.text: “你们之所以会在这里，是因为你们的家族已经和你们断绝了关系。你们全都是渣滓，只配呼吸底层甲板的臭气！”
languages.original_text: "The fact you're here means your families have disowned you. You're all refuse, and the stench of the lower decks is all you deserve!"

traits.locale_text: “你们之所以会在这里，是因为你们的家族已经和你们断绝了关系。你们全都是渣滓，只配呼吸底层甲板的臭气！”

languages.text: "Der Umstand, dass Ihr hier seid, heißt, Eure Familien haben Euch verstoßen. Ihr seid allesamt Abfall und verdient den Gestank der unteren Decks!"
languages.original_text: "The fact you're here means your families have disowned you. You're all refuse, and the stench of the lower decks is all you deserve!"

traits.locale_text: "Der Umstand, dass Ihr hier seid, heißt, Eure Familien haben Euch verstoßen. Ihr seid allesamt Abfall und verdient den Gestank der unteren Decks!"

languages.text: « Si vous êtes ici, c'est que vous avez été chassés par vos familles. Vous n'êtes que des ordures qui ne méritez rien de mieux que la puanteur des ponts inférieurs ! »
languages.original_text: "The fact you're here means your families have disowned you. You're all refuse, and the stench of the lower decks is all you deserve!"

traits.locale_text: « Si vous êtes ici, c'est que vous avez été chassés par vos familles. Vous n'êtes que des ordures qui ne méritez rien de mieux que la puanteur des ponts inférieurs ! »

languages.text: "Burada olduğunuza göre aileleriniz sizi evlatlıktan reddetmiş. Hepiniz çöpsünüz ve alt güvertelerin leş kokusundan başka bir şey hak etmiyorsunuz!"
languages.original_text: "The fact you're here means your families have disowned you. You're all refuse, and the stench of the lower decks is all you deserve!"
